6 New Religious Fantasy & Science Fiction Novels

Faith and fiction have always shared a fascinating relationship, with storytelling serving as a bridge between the divine and the human experience. Religious fantasy and science fiction take this connection even further, blending spiritual themes with otherworldly adventures, cosmic dilemmas, and magical revelations. Whether you’re drawn to tales of gods walking among mortals, futuristic societies grappling with faith, or epic battles between light and darkness, these six new novels offer fresh perspectives on the interplay between belief and imagination.

Verwaist aus Missbrauch

by Michelle Whetsell

Release Date: November 25 2024

Is wealth worth your love? Is it enough to pay the great price of your misery? Will the glory of a vastly prosperous golden kingdom be proved transient as eternity meets its death after its heart, the heart of its King, an exact picture of pain and suffering, loses its beat forever?

Buy on Amazon

The New Republic of Texas 4 (In The As The Light Dies World)

by David Saylor

Release Date: December 12 2024

In a world reeling from a catastrophic solar event, the New Republic of Texas faces threats from all sides. This thrilling installment “In The As the Light Dies” world follows a team of Texas Special Forces soldiers as they embark on a daring mission to infiltrate Cheyenne Mountain, a stronghold of the old US government.

Buy on Amazon

Judah Maccabee – Part 1: Abomination of Desolation (Chronicles of the Watchers)

by Brian Godawa

Release Date: December 8 2024

A supernatural epic novel about the Abomination of Desolation predicted by the Bible prophet Daniel that was fulfilled in the books of the Maccabees in the Apocrypha.

Buy on Amazon

Genesis Versus The Apocalypse (Footnail Book 5)

by A.K Howard

Release Date: November 29 2024

Uncover the secrets, face the revelations, and join Genesis on a riveting journey where Good triumphs against Evil in this heart-stopping fifth installment of the Footnail series.

Buy on Amazon

A Realm of Rebels (The Daughters of Qila Trilogy Book 1)

by Tania Ibrahim

Release Date: December 13 2024

A rebellion is shaking the realm. Cities are ablaze, kingdoms are feuding, and an ancient foe is knocking on Rokava’s door.

Buy on Amazon

Memoria (The Nightingale Trilogy Book 3)

by J.J. Fischer

Release Date: December 10 2024

When Caldera’s past catches up with the trio’s future, Sephone, Dorian, and Cass are forced to make decisions that threaten everything and everyone they care about. Each of them is offered a chance to sacrifice their own happiness for the sake of the other—but will they take it? And what will it cost them in the end?

Buy on Amazon
